merge.heading: How to merge pull request
merge.subheading: Pull Request cannot be merged automatically - please follow these steps:
merge.clean: 1. Make sure your workspace is clean
merge.resolve: 5. Resolve merge conflicts and add corrected files to index

config.title: Git Configuration
config.gcExpressionHelpText: Use Quartz Cron Expressions (SECOND MINUTE HOUR DAYOFMONTH MONTH DAYOFWEEK) to run git gc in intervals.
config.disabledHelpText: Enable or disable the Git plugin
